reviewText: I like action movies and they are very good with a lot of action to keep my interest would buy again.

ACTION ARSENAL 10 MOVIE PACK is another mixed bag (qualitywise) from BRENTWOOD HOME ENTERTAINMENT. There's one superior title here ("Confessions of a Police Captain"), along with a few other middling European-made crime films. The other half of this set was rated pretty dismally by poll respondents at a film resource website-- that is, they ranked less than 3, on a 1 to 10 scale. This collection may be ideal and -only- for action film completists. A similar BRENTWOOD title is CRIME WAVE 10 MOVIE PACK. This one has an astounding number of great actors in it-- check it out! . The following alphabetized program list includes individual poll scores for each movie, plus original theatrical titles (where indicated), country of origin (if other than USA), years of release and main actors. (7.4) Bad Cop I ("Confessions of a Police Captain") (Italy-1971) - Franco Nero/Martin Balsam (5.5) Bad Cop II ("Copkiller") (Italy-1983) - Harvey Keitel/Johnny Rotten/Sylvia Sydney (4.2) Blitz (W Ger-1986) - Jrgen Prochnow/Senta Berger/William Conrad (minor role) (4.6) Human Prey (1995) - Greg Cannone/Cliff Drew/Mickey Levy (4.7) Kill Cruise (W Ger-1990) - Jrgen Prochnow/Elizabeth Hurley (1.6) Mind, Body & Soul (1992) - Ginger Lynn Allen/Wings Hauser (???) Narcotic Justice (no data available) (2.4) Revenge Quest (1995) - Jennifer Agular/Christopher Michael Egger/Brian Gluhak (2.7) Street Vengeance (1997) - Ed Zajac/Jack van Landingham/Paul Henderson (2.4) Twisted Justice (1990) - Erik Estrada/Jim Brown/James Van Patten/Karen Black
